Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value and can greatly benefit your needs. Considering its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $200 for it. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique features and benefits this product offers. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
